messages.title: My long term plan for Tatton
messages.content: Support our local economy and back local businesses to create more jobs and attract new investment to Cheshire, as part of my proposals to build a Northern powerhouse.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support local economy and back local businesses to create more jobs and attract new investment to Cheshire, proposals to build a Northern powerhouse
Deliver more improvements in local transport, securing the Alderley Edge bypass, the better train service at Wilmslow and now the new A556
Make sure our local NHS continues to improve and deliver more services in the community, through local GP surgeries and the proposed new health clinic in Knutsford
Work with Cheshire East and Cheshire West Councils to deliver good services and low council tax
Ensure more children here are taught in good and outstanding schools
Back our local farmers and our rural community here in Cheshire by promoting local food and village facilities and getting more areas connected to superfast broadband

mentions.tacticalSituation: Unemployment is down 65% here. Now I have a long-term plan to raise the quality of life for everyone in the Tatton constituency.

issues.economy: Support our local economy and back local businesses to create more jobs and attract new investment to Cheshire, as part of my proposals to build a Northern powerhouse.
issues.education: Ensure more children here are taught in good and outstanding schools.
issues.governance: Work with Cheshire East and Cheshire West Councils to deliver good services and low council tax.
issues.health: Make sure our brilliant local NHS continues to improve and to deliver more services in the community, through local GP surgeries and the proposed new health clinic in Knutsford.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP, I fight hard for our whole community here in Cheshire, and try to help each and every person living here when problems arise. You can see I have a strong track record of delivering the new jobs, improved services and better local transport I’ve promised.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has a strong track record of delivering new jobs, improved services, and better local transport.

contactInformation.address: Conservative Office, Manchester Road, Knutsford WA16 0LT

endorsements.endorsement: Without George we’d never have seen the new Academy and Studio School in Knutsford.
George is a strong defender of our local NHS here.

endorsements.endorser: Tony Garnett, Chairman of Cheshire Show
endorsements.endorsement: George is a huge ally of local farmers.
When we needed support for the Knutsford Promenades, George was there.
It is very comforting to know that such a busy MP has the time to consider his constituents and their problems.

quotes.text: The local MP is a big supporter of our work here at Colshaw Farm.
quotes.source: Cathy Boyd, Director, Snow Angels community group

quotes.text: I’ve seen George fight hard for the most disadvantaged in our community.
quotes.source: Marie Fox, The Welcome Community Centre, Knutsford

images.caption: George working for the people of Tatton, supporting local residents, schools, businesses & community groups.
